title: Jerre's Black Bean and Pork Tenderloin Slow Cooker Chili
directions: Combine pork tenderloin, onion, red pepper, black beans, salsa, chicken broth, oregano, cumin, and chili powder in a slow cooker. Set to Low and cook for 8 to 10 hours.
Break up pieces of cooked pork to thicken the chili before serving.
ingredients: 9 ounces pork tenderloin, cut into 2 inch strips
1/2 small red bell pepper, coarsely chopped
